channel.title: Safe zones
channel.description: hello my server has wild everywhere, and i want to make it only wild where its supposed to be can someone PLEASE PLEASE help me!!

heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }[/quote]thank you but, i dont have nonwild or safezone, all i have is

public boolean Wild() {
if((absX <= 3249) ||
(absX >= 3258) ||
(absY <= 3415) ||
(absY >= 3424))
return true;
else
return false;
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2008, 11:50:00 AM[/size][hr]so can anyone help me, ive been asking for two days now and no one will help.
